items.title: Trump's Iran gamble fraught with risk - at home and abroad
items.description: As well as retaliation against US troops, a president who styled himself as "peacemaker" could face party dissent.

items.title: What we know about US strikes on Iran's nuclear facilities
items.description: Three nuclear facilities are reported to have been bombed, including the uranium enrichment facility at Fordo.

items.title: Watch: Trump says strikes on Iran a 'spectacular military success' in address
items.description: The US president warns Iran of future attacks if they retaliate.

items.title: Nobody can stop talking about the self-styled knight giving away cars
items.description: Some are beguiled by the Zimbabwean tycoon's generosity, others alarmed about the source of his wealth.

items.title: Giant Michael Jackson statues popped up 30 years ago. Where have they gone?
items.description: The King Of Pop had 10 statues made in his image in 1995, but where can they be seen three decade later?
